content: In 2016, which British musician won the Grammy Award for Album of the Year for her album '25'?

The British musician who won the Grammy Award for Album of the Year in 2016 for her album '25' is Adele. The album was a massive success, featuring hit songs like "Hello" and "Send My Love (to Your New Lover)." It's known for its powerful vocals and emotional ballads, solidifying Adele's position as one of the leading voices in contemporary music.
